message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you, but I'm open to negotiations if you have any thoughts.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of this unique item, $1500000 is unfortunately outside my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $1000000 for it.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this further.

I understand that $1000000 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm still confident that this product has significant value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1250000. This is a compromise that I believe is fair, considering the product's worth to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1250000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking to my original offer of $1000000.  It's my maximum budget, and I'm confident this product is worth that to me.  Let me know if you're willing to accept.
